title: DevNet Alexa Data Center Skill
slug: In this lab you put together the pieces for an Alexa Skill to use voice commands to manage Cisco Data Center Infrastructure. For this lab, Cisco UCS and Cisco UCS Manager represents your Data Center Infrastructure. Cisco refers to its line of compute offerings collectively as the Unified Compute System (UCS). UCS Manager offers one way of managing those compute resources. You don't need to know anything about UCS Manager to complete this Learning Lab. If you do, great, but it's okay if you don't.

files.title: Manage the Data Center With Voice
